titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2209) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-263, by Mr. McInnis.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2209. The resolution waives all points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill, and all points of order against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 94.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 186 (Roll no. 430).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 408 - 5 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/23/1997--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2209 (legislative branch appropriations).
